title: How long will ranked be down?
body: How long is the ranked system going to be down for?

replies.body:
Ranked isn't down at the moment, but if you're having issues selecting ranked queues, running a repair should resolve it, as *Galazar* mentioned.

Let me know if you have any questions.
It's not down, people are having trouble playing ranked, I had the same problem. go to settings in the top right corner and press initiate full repair. Worked for me.
